name: Violet Poison Magician
desc:
Pendulum Effect
Once per turn, if a DARK Spellcaster-Type monster you control battles, before damage calculation: You can make that monster gain 1200 ATK, then destroy this card. This ATK increase lasts until the end of the Damage Step (even if this card leaves the field).

Monster Effect
(This card is always treated as a "Fusion Dragon" card.)
If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it.
